snippet: Egyptian state television accused Hamas, the Palestinian organization that controls Gaza, of training Egyptian Islamists how to carry out bombings.
abstract: Egyptian state television accuses Hamas, Palestinian organization that controls Gaza, of training Egyptian Islamists to carry out bombings; Hamas denies accusation, which appears intended by military-backed Egyptian government to apply additional pressure on the Muslim Brotherhood, with which Hamas is allied.
lead_paragraph: Egyptian state television accused Hamas, the Palestinian organization that controls Gaza, of training Egyptian Islamists how to carry out bombings.

headline.main: Egypt: Hamas Accused of Training Islamists for Bomb Attacks
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Hamas Accused of Training Islamists for Bomb Attacks
